CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, telegram_user_id BIGINT UNIQUE NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(65), last_name VARCHAR(65), username VARCHAR(33) UNIQUE, question VARCHAR(4097), notification_allowed BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, state VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'GREETING' );
CREATE INDEX idx_notification_allowed ON users (notification_allowed);
